Little_Rock.Rapillard House: The Rapillard House is a historic house at 123 West 7th Street in North Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a two-story structure, with a steeply pitched gable roof, and an exterior of brick and stucco. A two-story cross-gabled section flanks the entrance on the right, while the roof above the center and left bays is broken by gabled dormers.
